includes/Integrations/GreenshiftSync.php.description: GreenshiftSync integration class syncs FRS profile data to WordPress user meta with 'frs_' prefix. Hooks into frs_profile_saved action. Stores JSON fields in dual format (raw JSON and comma-separated list with '_list' suffix).

includes/Controllers/FieldShortcodes.php.description: Security implementation includes: ALLOWED_SCALAR_FIELDS (40 safe fields), ALLOWED_ARRAY_FIELDS (9 array fields), EXCLUDED_FIELDS (sensitive fields like followupboss_api_key, privacy_settings), is_field_allowed() validation method, get_allowed_fields() public accessor for documentation. Input sanitized with sanitize_key(), all output escaped.

composer.json.description: PSR-4 autoloading maps FRSUsers\\ to includes/ directory. New classes must have namespace matching directory structure (e.g., FRSUsers\Integrations for includes/Integrations/)
